001package io.github.ai4ci.flow.builders;
002
003import io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutablePersonBaseline;
004import io.github.ai4ci.abm.Person;
005import io.github.ai4ci.config.execution.ExecutionConfiguration;
006import io.github.ai4ci.util.ReflectionUtils;
007import io.github.ai4ci.util.Sampler;
008
009/**
010 * Default logic for producing a per‑person {@link ImmutablePersonBaseline}.
011 *
012 * <p>
013 * This interface provides a focused default implementation for person
014 * baselining that populates persistent person attributes such as mobility
015 * baseline, compliance, app use probability and symptom test characteristics.
016 * It centralises the common per‑person baseline logic so that alternative
017 * builders can reuse or replace it easily.
018 *
019 * <p>
020 * Role in composition:
021 * {@link io.github.ai4ci.flow.builders.DefaultModelBuilder} implements this
022 * interface and delegates person baselining to the default method via
023 * {@code DefaultPersonBaseliner.super.baselinePerson(...)}. This explicit
024 * delegation keeps the wiring clear: callers may use the concrete
025 * {@code DefaultModelBuilder} or substitute a different baseliner by
026 * implementing this interface or by subclassing the model builder and
027 * overriding the delegation point.
028 *
029 * <p>
030 * Behaviour and sequencing: the default method adjusts the outbreak's execution
031 * configuration for the individual's demographic group (using
032 * {@link io.github.ai4ci.util.ReflectionUtils#modify}), initialises the
033 * person's state machine and samples distributional entries. The method is
034 * intended to be invoked after setup and before initialisation of runtime
035 * person state; in particular it assumes the outbreak's execution configuration
036 * and demographic adjustment are available.
037 *
038 * <p>
039 * Extension guidance: implementers who replace this default should preserve the
040 * contract that the method returns a built {@link ImmutablePersonBaseline} and
041 * should avoid heavy IO or long running tasks inside the method unless
042 * coordinated by the calling builder. For compute heavy per‑person work
043 * consider precomputing aggregates during outbreak baselining.
044 *
045 * @author Rob Challen
046 */
047public interface DefaultPersonBaseliner {
048
049        /**
050         * Build a per‑person baseline from the supplied person and the outbreak's
051         * execution configuration.
052         *
053         * <p>
054         * The default implementation performs these steps:
055         * <ol>
056         * <li>Adjust the outbreak execution configuration using the person's
057         * demographic via {@link ReflectionUtils#modify}.</li>
058         * <li>Initialise the person's state machine with the configured default
059         * behaviour model.</li>
060         * <li>Sample distributional entries from the adjusted configuration to
061         * populate mobility, compliance and app use probabilities.</li>
062         * <li>Set symptom sensitivity, specificity and self‑isolation depth from the
063         * adjusted configuration.</li>
064         * </ol>
065         *
066         * <p>
067         * Composition note: when used from
068         * {@link io.github.ai4ci.flow.builders.DefaultModelBuilder} this method is
069         * invoked by the builder's delegation and therefore forms the canonical
070         * per‑person baseline behaviour for the default builder.
071         *
072         * @param builder the person baseline builder to populate
073         * @param person  the person for whom the baseline is being built
074         * @param rng     random sampler used to sample distributional entries
075         * @return the built {@link ImmutablePersonBaseline}
076         */
077        default ImmutablePersonBaseline baselinePerson(
078                        ImmutablePersonBaseline.Builder builder, Person person, Sampler rng
079        ) {
080                ExecutionConfiguration configuration = ReflectionUtils.modify(
081                                person.getOutbreak().getExecutionConfiguration(),
082                                person.getOutbreak().getExecutionConfiguration()
083                                                .getDemographicAdjustment(),
084                                person.getDemographic()
085                );
086                person.getStateMachine().init(configuration.getDefaultBehaviourModel());
087
088                builder
089                                .setMobilityBaseline(
090                                                configuration.getContactProbability().sample(rng)
091                                )
092                                .setComplianceBaseline(
093                                                configuration.getComplianceProbability().sample(rng)
094                                )
095                                .setAppUseProbability(
096                                                configuration.getAppUseProbability().sample(rng)
097                                ).setDefaultBehaviourState(configuration.getDefaultBehaviourModel())
098
099                                .setSymptomSensitivity(
100                                                configuration.getSymptomSensitivity().sample(rng)
101                                )
102                                .setSymptomSpecificity(
103                                                configuration.getSymptomSpecificity().sample(rng)
104                                ).setSelfIsolationDepth(
105                                                configuration.getMaximumSocialContactReduction().sample(rng)
106                                );
107
108                return builder.build();
109        }
110
111}
